title: Crowned by Fate
description: He asked me to love him, so I engraved his name onto my heart.He craved my loyalty, so I let him feast on my soul.I wanted a husband, but he gave me a monster.So, I made it my pet.The lines between what was real and what wasnâ€™t were blurred.Our story was a lie.Until now.
author: Amo Jones
